A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
On its own\, I'd rank the film as just below average\, but compared to the previous two releases in the Star Wars franchise\, it's horrible.
It had some solid moments\, particularly involving the character development of Kylo Ren and one exceptional scene where Luke talks to an old friend\, but overall the film was a mess of awkward comic relief\, an absolutely unneeded side-plot\, and filler fit for a Straight-To-DVD childrens' film.

Nevertheless\, this film doesn't deserve a 75% critic score\, let alone 93%.
